message:
heres a bot. not made to be chat with. but used to narrate. u can use ts by adding new character in the thread and make them describe a scene. but since they are beginner narrator they often break character and break the 4th wall.
https://perchance.org/ai-character-chat?data=Beginner_Narrator~8792c0216420da42357a77ca8c0b90d7.gz
